385190.name: Celestial Tear: Demon's Revenge
385190.description:
Demon's Revenge is a gothic fantasy RPG where the supernatural fights against the tyranny of mankind.

Engaging turn-based battle


Execute devastating light, medium, and hard attacks to build up your rage and perform powerful combo finishers. Take advantage of enemies’ mistakes with skill-based dodging and counterattacks.

Who are the real beasts?


Time has run out in this story about revenge and redemption! The Demon Ridders, protectors of Hasphal, want Sen dead. She must find a way to forgive herself for her past or become the monster the world believes she is. Only her actions will reveal her fate.

A Gothic Fantasy Adventure


Explore Hasphal, a planet full of long-lost secrets and hidden artifacts from a forgotten past. The party will battle ghouls, ghosts, and mythical beasts as they uncover the truth about the world and what’s to come.

FEATURES


  • Dynamic decisions affect the story and characters
  • A unique turn-based combo-oriented combat system
  • A diverse, original soundtrack featuring over 70 tracks
  • Engaging comic cutscenes
  • Interesting and unique tool-based puzzles
